extension.news: Last v17 feature update: more highlighting improvements[CR][CR][B]New[/B][CR]- add option to adjust dim factor of unfocused art [CR]- add option for additional text highlight[CR]- add channel icon to PVR info dialog[CR]- add new widget options (through skin.helper.widgets script)[CR]- add AURO media flags (based on file naming)[CR]- add new cover art highlighting (size change depending on focused state)[CR][CR][B]Improved[/B][CR]- add more weather information to weather window[CR]- refine music icons[CR]- remove watched status for music items (in views and widgets)[CR]- adjust representation of object based audio codec tags[CR]- refine positioning and scaling of media tag icons[CR]- adjust viewtype 55 for music and add-ons to match viewtype 53 for movies and TV shows[CR]- improve highlight color of selected text[CR]- change appearance of all progress icons to round shape[CR][CR][B]Fixed[/B][CR]- fix scrollbar in music navigation[CR]- fix item widths in various windows[CR]- fix weather window[CR]- fix focused items in addon list view (e.g. YouTube)[CR]- fix PVR views to add scrolling and adapt season/episode representation[CR]- fix widget details label for PVR items (when using skinshortcuts script)[CR][CR][B]Maintainer:[/B] Chillbo + NoDruid
